tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Workshop introduction and reserving LiveLabs sandbox

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Use OCI Vision through the OCI Console
tutorials.description: The user gets familiar with the OCI console and OCI Vision

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Use OCI Data Labeling to label images
tutorials.description: The user labels space images using OCI Data Labeling

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Create a Custom AI Vision Model
tutorials.description: The user trains a custom object detection model

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Explore space images
tutorials.description: The user creates a data flow and workbook in Analytic Cloud to detect objects in space images then view them

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
